headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pegassi Vortex
content: Can’t make up your mind whether you’re a leather clad vintage racer or a hypermodern speed freak? Luckily for you Pegassi couldn’t choose either, and with their new Vortex they’ve managed to repackage your crippling indecision as a brave fusion of old and new. If this doesn’t put a big, expensive smile on your face, nothing will.
